participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.background: I would like to learn how to train my dogs to behave better. I'm afraid that my students will fail to learn and grow. I enjoy sharing my love of music and unicorns with others. I am not honest about my relationship with my girlfriend. I wish my dog could talk so that I could tell him how much I love him.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.background: I took my dogs for a walk in the woods and saw a deer. I love making short films with my camcorder. I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation. I am a free spirit. I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.

content.text: I read that you love short films! What is your favorite type of short film?

I like to make my own short films, but I also love watching them! I think my favorite type of short film is the kind that makes you think. I love when a short film can leave me with a lot to think about.
I agree! I love short films that make me feel something.
Me too! I think short films are such a powerful way to tell stories. You can pack so much emotion and meaning into a short film.
I'm glad to meet someone else who enjoys short films! I don't know many people who are into them.
Me neither! I'm always happy to meet someone else who shares my love of short films.
What kind of camera do you use to make your short films?
I use a Canon EOS Rebel T7i. It's a great camera for the price.
I've heard good things about that camera! I'm thinking about getting a new camera soon.
It's a great camera! I'm sure you'd be happy with it.
I'm glad to hear that! I think I'm going to go ahead and buy one.
That's great! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks for talking to me about short films! I'm excited to make some of my own.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about short films. I'm excited to see yours!
